prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that embodies the power of storms with vibrant green feathers and purple accents.
Imagine a mythical creature with a fierce appearance and large wings, perfect for aerial battles.
Design a Pokemon inspired by wind and nature, featuring a striking green body and purple markings.
Show me an aerial Pokemon with a flowing tail and a strong presence, ideal for commanding the skies.
Make a Pokemon that harnesses the elements, displaying vivid colors and a majestic winged form.
Generate a creature with a bold and dynamic design, showcasing its connection to the forces of nature.
I want an epic Pokemon that represents the power of the sky, with unique features and an imposing figure.
